pack.name: Stormlight RPG Core (Data Pack)
pack.notes: Heroic path metadata keyed to heroic key talents in docs/stormlight_pack.initial.v1.json.

records.name: Agent
records.theme: A talented operative who solves problems with a keen mind or deft hand.
records.key_talent_summary: Opportunist: Reroll the plot die once per round.
records.rules_text: Agents specialize in subtlety and problem-solving, gaining the Opportunist key talent and access to investigative specialties.

records.name: Envoy
records.theme: An insightful negotiator who adeptly influences others.
records.key_talent_summary: Rousing Presence: Make an ally Determined.
records.rules_text: Envoys rally allies through presence and conviction, starting with Rousing Presence and social specialties.

records.name: Hunter
records.theme: A skilled sharpshooter and outdoorsperson who seeks and eliminates problems.
records.key_talent_summary: Seek Quarry: Choose a character to pursue and gain an advantage against them.
records.rules_text: Hunters excel at pursuit and precision, beginning with Seek Quarry and ranged specialties.

records.name: Leader
records.theme: A poised commander who directs and guides others to be their best.
records.key_talent_summary: Decisive Command: Add a d4 command die to an allyâ€™s tests.
records.rules_text: Leaders coordinate the team with decisive direction, starting with Decisive Command.

records.name: Scholar
records.theme: An adroit thinker who excels at planning and building.
records.key_talent_summary: Erudition: Gain bonus skill ranks that you can reallocate.
records.rules_text: Scholars focus on knowledge and preparation, starting with Erudition and intellectual specialties.

records.name: Warrior
records.theme: A fighter who relies on skill, brute strength, or indomitable will.
records.key_talent_summary: Vigilant Stance: Gain a fighting stance that makes you more responsive and flexible in combat.
records.rules_text: Warriors rely on battlefield prowess, beginning with Vigilant Stance and martial specialties.
